notes.title: React - Hooks
notes.content:
Hooks are function that let you use states and other React features. 

useEffect() and useState() are two famous React hooks.

notes.title: React - useState()
notes.content:
useState is a React hooks that gives access to a value and a setter.
Any time the setter is called the value is updated and the component re-render.
You can pass a default value to useState.

Example :

const [value,setValue] = useState("defaultValue")
